lexUnit.name: slam.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: crash or strike heavily into.

sentence.text: Simultaneously the window slammed shut and there was nothing but a quivering of curtains where Mrs Rogers ' face had been .
If only he had called out before the door slammed shut !
The door slammed open and Celia walked in .
The weighted door slams shut and she consumes her prey in safety .
A door slammed downstairs .
Dalziel and Pascoe looked at each other for a long moment after the door had slammed behind Evans .
Behind Thorfinn , the door slammed shut with a force that made her bed jerk .
And then something slammed hard against one of the boards .
Quickly she reached for the doorknob , only to find her frantic effort useless as Rune 's hand slammed against the door , holding it fast .
Tallis stood her ground , and then was shocked as Morthen 's blade slammed against her jaw , almost completely following the line of the old scar .
He staggered , his back slamming against the wall across the aisle .
` Then she was being thrown violently up and backwards , her spine slamming against the far wall .
When the great gate of Newgate slammed behind them , Cranston leaned against it , gasping for clean air , his great body quivering like a beached whale 's .
We heard it slam behind us and the key turn in the lock .
On-coming cars skidded to either side , slamming into basement dwellings , ploughing along sidewalks , overturning and bursting into flames .
The speeding Audi and the Volvo slammed into each other with sufficient force to buckle the Audi 's grille and shatter both headlights .
The Jeep slammed into the gates some more , but still not enough to drive through .
His head was forced down , so that the safety-bar slammed into his neck .
The last brick slammed into place .
The hammer finally slammed down on an empty chamber .
Artillery shells slammed down on Sarajevo , sometimes at the rate of one a minute , as rebel Serb tanks and infantry attacked Bosnian defenders in the strategic western suburbs of Stup and Azici .
It flung open and slammed back against the wall .
The hooves slammed out and with a snort of terror it hurtled off up the path followed by the others .
The door slammed shut and he bolted it .
An instant later , the butt of Larsen 's gun slammed down on the back of the man 's head , and he crumpled to the floor in a senseless heap .
Suddenly , from the floor below they heard the study door slam and Stephen 's quick step towards the sitting room .
A nearby door slammed and the pitter-patter of small feet were heard , running up the stairs .
A diamond , mounted on a spinning saw-blade , slams into the workpiece at a speed comparable with the cruising speed of a car .
Then I was slamming into Elk 's Club Surf , still sliding left , still fighting for balance , for everything and anything that would keep me upright .
The catamaran 's stern slammed on rock and they heard , above the scream of the wind , the rudders shatter .
Kath 's heart slammed against her ribs , and she felt the blood drain from her face .
Shots slammed into the walls inside the courtyard where the civilians cried and threw themselves on the ground .
The shock waves travelled through the wall and slammed into our heads and then there was silence as the dismembered vehicle fell through the air .
